inclusion.criterion: histological or neuroradiographic documented recurrent glioma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma.

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance score (KPS) of > or equal to 50
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease per MacDonald criteria is required
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma.

inclusion.criterion: Predicted life expectancy of at least 12 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pregnancy test for females with child-bearing potential negative
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have been previously treated with both surgery and radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation.

exclusion.criterion: Patients have evidence of leptomeningeal spread of disease
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of irritable bowel disease, irritable bowel syndrome, chronic diarrhea or presence of a bowel obstruction
exclusion.label: unknown
does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient has been treated with CPT-11 Weekly x4

notes: Predicted life expectancy and ANC, Platelets, Serum Creatinine, Serum Bilirubin, AST/ALT are unknown.
